reporter-output.line: Step Description--> StepNumber-1 Executing : CreateSpiritLogin
Step Description--> Entering Userid as anmolmishra0304@gmail.com
Step Description--> Entering Password as steveJOBS@123
Step Description--> Click on Submit
Step Description--> Login Successful
Step Description--> StepNumber-2 Executing : CreateOrder
Step Description--> Traversed TO Home Page to Perform Liquor Category Updates
Step Description--> Click on Beer
Step Description--> Applied HIGH TO LOW Filter
Step Description--> Click on First Product
Step Description--> Price of The Product is ₹ 360
Step Description--> Name of The Product is Asahi Super Dry
Step Description--> Availability status : IN STOCK
Step Description--> Clicked on Add to cart
Step Description--> Traversed TO CART
Step Description--> Permit Not Applied
Step Description--> One Day Permit Cost is ₹ 5
Step Description--> Total Amount is ₹ 1,805
Step Description--> Clicked on Pay On Order
Step Description--> Clicked Submit Button
Step Description--> Clicked on Test Wallet
Step Description--> Clicked on Success
Step Description--> Clicked on Orderstatus Button
Step Description--> Order No. 26551
Step Description--> Traversed to Order Details
Step Description--> Order Sucessfully Placed

param.value: To verify if System is Allowing to select Product via Category module and add Filter (BEER) and Price High To Low to Place Order
